channel.title: Manage your server when your away?
channel.description: hey guys idk really were this would go but, i am going to visit family this weekend and i host my server from my desktop computer at home. so im wondering if there is a way i can manage my server from my laptop when im visiting family. like a remote connection like how vps does it?

item.title: Manage your server when your away?
item.dc:creator: @ERS ERS
item.description:
@ERS wrote:

deans1243:

what do you mean rec my computer??

record ur computer to see whats been happening while using auto clicker

Read full topic

item.title: Manage your server when your away?
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

deans1243:

ok sence we are done with this topic does anybody know how to make dclaws spec 4x on players. right now they only spec 4x on npc and 2x on players. ill rep+ for this help:)

Dude!!??!?!?,wtf!
Lol,i suggest making a new topic…
But there is tutorials on it,so search first

@topic Like everyone has been saying,team viewer or remote desktop

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

prison190:

OLLIE if you quit why are you still posting?

Not relevant to the topic, PM. Not trying to be arrogant but I find it quite rude.

@topic: I believe you can edit the setting in teamviewer to suit your needs. If you’ve already done it then great.

item.title: Manage your server when your away?
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

no i have a set password on my hosting computer and im just going to keep team viewer up just minimized so when i need to do somethin i just connect type pass and it works. ive already tested everything out and made sure i can do it haha

Read full topic

item.source: Manage your server when your away?

item.title: Manage your server when your away?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

As suggested above use Teamviewer, you can obtain it @ http://www.teamviewer.com/index.aspx

Simply write down the code/password and then download it on your other computer and connect, I’m sure the site has a full explanation. Or you could use RDC (Remote desktop connection) but I think Teamviewer should do it.

Read full topic

easy use autoclicker every 65 sec’s to open and close a floder or program / or just use teamviewer lol/or rec ur computer
